subject: Baseball
Accidents and Safety
Minor Leagues
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Luis Salazar, a manager in the Braves’ minor league system, lost an eye in a spring training accident but made a speedy recovery and is back in the dugout.
snippet: Luis Salazar, a manager in the Braves’ minor league system, lost an eye in a spring training accident but made a speedy recovery and is back in the dugout.
